1.content:
(Note: This is to remain 2nd person. You are Lenard)

You slowly opened your eyes as your vision adjusts to a bright new sunny day. Yawning, you looked over to where the sun light had crept its way into. The half closed blinds that blocked your window had rays of light coming through it. You sat up in your bed, eyes still full of sleep, and scratched the top of your navy blue hair. Sighing, you lounged out of your bed, almost falling to the floor, and walked over to the blinds. You rubbed your eyes and pulled up the blinds, letting more sunlight make its way in. Putting an arm over your head till to you got used to the sunlight, you looked out your window.

It was beautiful outside. Little squirrels and birds ran and flew through your neighborhood, chirping and singing. You saw the mail truck come around the cul-de-sac, swiftly putting everyones mail in the mailbox, including yours. You smiled, happy that you woke up to a beautiful day. You hoped that the rest of the day would be even better.

Little did you know your whole summer was going to change......

You walked into the bathroom to freshen up, fully awake from just gazing out at the neighborhood. You looked in in the mirror to find a 6'1 pale skinned boy with navy blue hair, and red ruby eyes that could stare into souls. You shivered at wonder if your eyes could look into souls. After doing your daily bathroom routine, you walked down to the kitchen to find the sweet aroma of eggs and sausage sizzling in the pan.

You saw your mother in an apron standing over the stove to attend to the eggs and sausage, and your dad, sipping a cup of freshly brewed coffee and reading the news paper.

"Good moring, parents." you said with a grin on your face. Your dad greeted you with his famous cup raise and nod before getting back to his newspaper, and your mom put the eggs and sausage on a plate, bringging it to you.

She handed you the plate of breakfast and kissed you on your cheek. "Good morning, son. Did you sleep well?" She asked. You nodded and went to the table where your dad is seated. You started on your first plate of summer breakfast.

Your father looked away from his newspaper to look at you. "You know, Len, it's the first day of summer. What were you planning to do?" He put an elbow on the table, awaiting your answer. You thought about this for a minute. You finished working at your job you had during school, (which paid you enough money to treat yourself to a well earned vacation) and you really didn't have a lot of friends, not after your bodybuilder incident.

You turned your attention back to your dad. "I don't know........but why do you ask?"

He chuckled and turned to your mom, "Should I tell him, Doris?"

You looked over to your mom who had just finished washing dishes. Her face had worry written all over it. Your raised an eyebrow. Your parents usually don't hide any secrets that involve you. Especially if it made your mother like this.

"Is there something wrong?" you asked in concern. Your father gave your mom an impatient/annoyed look, rolled his eyes, and averted his eyes to you.

Sighing, he lighted his smoke pipe and sat back in the chair as he blew smoke. "Son, I know that the situation you had during junior year was a living hell......" he sighed, shaking his head.

Before he continued, your mom came in with the mail. She put everything down except a strange blue letter. "Leonard......baby. He has to know. He'll hate us if we don't tell him. She sat down in a chair in between you and your dad.

He continued, "Len, don't freak out when I say this." You silently waited for what he was about to say. "We got you a passport to an island of body builders.

Your heart lurched up to your throat. "W-wha-what did you say?"

Your mom had tears in her eyes, "Oh son! I'm so sorry" She got out of her seat and bear hugged you. "The therapist said the only way you can get over your fear of bodybuilders-"

"Is to be confronted by many at once." Your dad interrupted.

You felt your whole summer crashing down. You couldn't do this. It was bad enough to have to get rid of one. You could only imagine how over 100 of them after you. You didn't want to do this.

"Son, Len.......look at me." Your dad asked with sympathy. You slowly turned your head to him. "Do this for me, for your mom. But most importantly, for your peace at mind."

Your dad was right, you have to do this. If you ever wanted to get over this, you have to go to the island.

You sighed, "Okay, what am I gonna do there?"

Your dad adjusted his pipe, "Well.......there at the island, you'll have to
1.title: Lenny's summer surprise

Her arms were toned and vieny, causing you to shiver. Once you got to her, she reached down to grab your belt buckle, pulling you up with no struggle.

She giggled and shook her head, "There is no door. I get in through a short tunnel entrance on the outside of the island." The ebony beauty lifted her breasts up and down with her free hand. 112.content:
You pulled off the ebony amazon's lip with a *smack!*, earning a high pitched moan from her, "Her trainee?" You saiworkd, confused by what the sexy behemoth meant.

The dazed ebony fluttered her eyes, recovering from her ecstasy, she nodded, "Mhm, she basically is going to condition your body to limits beyond what is humanly capable." You gulped hearing this, as you weren't exactly the work out type, especially compared to bodybuilders. The ebony amazon frowned at your expression, "Ah, don't worry, babe. It's just so you'll be able to handle the females that will try to take advantage of you while on the island." She stroked your face softly to calm you. It didn't work.

Thinking about this new information in you head, you asked, "What kind of training will be involved in her methods?"

The amazon smiled, her bright purple eyes flashing as she stared at you, "Ohh, just a bit of weightlifting......." She trailed off, as if thinking of what to say next.

You had a sigh of relief, "That doesn't sound so--"

"Annnnnnnd, screwing, parkour, swimming, rock climbing, tire lifting, a bit of mixed martial arts, yoga, sports, & cooking!" The ebony was beaming at the very last one. Gulping, you wrapped your arms around the ebony's tight ab-infested stomach. The thought of being around all of those females at one time, it terrified you beyond limits. The amazon ebony laughed, holding you closer, "Don't be scared, little man! We prepared everything for your arrival. Remember, we were expecting you." She kissed your cheek.

You looked up at her, "You guys were?" Weird......it's like this may have been planned after all.

"Of course! Your parents & therapist told three of our best & strongest women to make sure your stay here at the island was the best it could possibly be! Those three females were ordered to protect you with their very lives." The amazon took you in her arms as she opened the door to a tunnel. She jumped down, you still cradled in her protecting arms. "If you haven't guessed already, I am one of those females."

Damn, Dr.Fredrick really IS the best therapist you could ever wish for. You looked up at the amazons triumphant expression as she traversed the tiki tunnel. The tunnel itself was boarded up with wood from trees to prevent dirt from caving in, and the ground was covered in what seemed like the island's sand. The muscular ebony paused once she reached a crossway of three paths to choose from: One leading to the island (The sign said BOA, acronym for "Body of Ages"), another leading to the beach portion of the island (The sign says Body Beach), and the last tunnel with a DO NOT ENTER sign on it. Where could that lead.

The Amazon looked down at you, her smile never leaving here face, "You alright? I hope that information didn't startle you TOO much." She giggled.

You took this time to really analyze the beauty of this muscular female, taking in her plump, luscious lips to her perfect rounded cheeks. You noticed a bit of lip gloss on her lips with a hint of coconut scent on her. This amazon was down right gorgeous! "N-no......it's just......I don't know what to say....."

She brushed some of your hair out of your face, "Well, if it makes you feel any better, every bodybuilder on the island was put under an oath to not do anything that could put you on the verge of death."

The amazon continued through the entrance to the island, you suddenly realized something, "Miss, I never got your name. My name is Lenard, but everyone calls me Lenny."

She smiled, "Cute name, but I think I'll stick with 'babe' for now." She chuckled, "Well, my name is Rebecca, but everyone here calls me Rebel or Reb."

You tilted your head at her nickname, "Why's that?"

Rebecca placed you on her shoulders & started to speed up to a jog, "Because I'm against everything the boss bitch & those who follow her are for." She frowned again at the word boss.

"Is Patricia really that bad?" You asked Reb, running a hand through her silky long black hair. She giggle at your touch.

"More than you ought to believe. But don't worry babe, I'm not taking you to her right now." Rebel rubbed your leg, reassuring you.

You gulped, "So where are we going?"

152.content:
Your dad looked at you with sincere concern, “Son........I feel as if I’ve failed my part in preparing you for the world.”

You looked at him, genuinely confused. “What do you mean, Dad?” He usually says confusing things, but this was probably the rubix cube of all his sayings.

“I mean, you lack social skills, haven’t had a girlfriend, are still a virgin, & have been bullied by a female to the point where you almost lost your penis. Dammit! I’m- I’m sorry, son!” Your dad had tears rolling down his eyes.

“Leonard!” Your mother slapped your father on his shoulder for saying such harsh words.

She turned to you, nothing but worry filling her face. “Lenny..........what your father is trying to say is that we want you to become a more well rounded individual. Going to this island resort will help that.” Your mom grabbed a letter off the counter, which had a sticker of a buff female flexing her biceps. “Read it son.”

The note:

Dear Mr. Leonard Norman,
Congratulations! You’ve been selected to join the BTA island’s (Body of The Ages) Kickboxing team! This is a great opportunity for you. Not only will you be able to travel to different islands competing, meeting new people, you’re also one of first males to have ever been personally invited to the island!
You’ll be personally guided around the island by Oasis, our top player & the head of the kickboxing team. You’re probably extremely nervous at the thought of living on an island full of muscular women, but most men would KILL to be in your position. Take advantage of ALL opportunities available to you! (& I mean ALL! ;) )

Can’t wait to see you!

- Brenda, head of BTA’s secretary & marketing office

You had mixed feelings about the letter. A kickboxing team? You’ve only played fighting games on your PS4. An island filled with your worst nightmares? There’s a possibility that Katherine may be there! You paced back & forth, hoping this was just a bad dream that your mind refuses to let you wake up from.

Your dad stopped you, putting his hands on your shoulders, “Son, I want you to face your fears.” You could feel his eyes piercing into your soul, “I want you to become stronger. Faster. More confident in yourself & your skills.” Your father’s encouraging words actually made you feel better.

He continued, “Son, you’re too young to be living your life in fear of what Katherine did to you. As long as you follow this program, get in shape, & be the best male competitor they have, the NEXT time you see Katherine, you can settle the score.”

You were almost appalled at the words coming out of your father’s mouth. “Dad, I don’t want revenge. I just want a peaceful summer. & to keep my dick intact.” Your heart was racing at the thought of Katherine’s wicked deed that almost left you asexual.

“It’s not about revenge, Lenny, but about defending your honor. Your respect. You need this more than you realize. Now........pack your bags. I’m driving you to the airport.” Your dad’s face was extremely serious. He’s not joking around.

So, you went upstairs & started packing, hoping this was just a bad dream. But the more you packed, the realer it became............
152.title: First step towards strength.......

choices: 2 female bodybuilders who happen to be the gate guards
1521.content:
You felt such a sad sting in the pit of your heart as you coaster through the air of your first class private airplane. Your mind only focused on the words your Dad left with you:

“Lenny.............you must face your fears. & when you see Katherine again.........settle the score.”

Settle the score? You shook your head with intense force. ‘How can I settle it?’ You thought to yourself, ‘She was practically the strongest girl in my school...........hell, she was outdoing the guys at their own sports!’ You couldn’t see yourself ever winning in a fight against Katherine. At least not at your current state. The scars she left you with will forever be imprinted in your subconscious whenever you see a muscular woman.

You guided your hand along your crotch, almost feeling the dissolved stitching tissue that healed over your dick. It’s been a minute since you could even pee, let alone masturbate without pain.

Sighing, you decided to focus your mind on the great amenities the plane ride had to offer. Sitting in your chair that could convert into a bed, you grabbed a gaming controller & switched the tv to God Of War. You always loved this game since 2005.

A stewardess came in with a pamphlet, “Hello sir! I hope you’re enjoying the flight!” She smiled brightly. “May I interest you in some selections for dinner? It’s all on us, so order whatever you like!” She opened the dinner pamphlet, revealing meals that not even 5-star restaurants could pull off.

You picked an Alfredo pasta entree, “I’ll take this along with an Oreo milkshake for dessert.”

The stewardess nodded, “Excellent choice! I’ll return with your meal in a bit.” She closed your cabin door behind her, leaving you at peace once more.

You laid back, looking at the wall screen that showed how far you were from the island: 2 1/2 hours. You sighed, “Better enjoy this while it lasts.........” You said, returning back to your game.


~ 2 1/2 hours later.......... ~

You woke up to a soothing plane pilot voice informing all the riders (Literally only you) that you’d arrived in East Africa. You were one step closer to your impending doom..........or so you thought.

A stop for food, fight with baggage claim, & short taxi-to-boat ride later, you were facing the entrance for Body of The Ages. It was a huge island, prolific in green vegetation & even more tropical animals you’ve only ever heard of on the Discovery channel. The entrance was blocked by a 40 foot tall gate with a painting for probably the most beautiful (yet terrifying) woman you’ve ever seen.

She looked to be at least 5’3 in actual height. She was incredibly toned, sporting a six pack & abs you could grind stones on. She had a strong, yet petite figure. Her eyes glistened with a color of the clear waters of the island sea. She also had curves, from her waist all the down to her ample ass. It looked as though you could fit both in the palm of your hand. & to top it all off, her hair was long, brown, & almost flowing in that still image.

“........wow.........” is all you could muster, not believing for a second that you’re actually attracted to a muscular woman.

You walked closer to the gate, noticing her black 2 piece athletic wear had the logo of a Vale Tudo team: The Grappler gang.

“Hmmm..........I wonder if that’s the team I’m supposed to be on.......?” You said, running a hand through your blue hair.

You didn’t have much time to think when the gate suddenly opened to reveal:
1521.title: Lenny’s internal battle

choices: A white woman that was slightly shorter than you with lean, compact muscles
A tan woman twice your size with huge, bulging muscles and beach ball sized tits

154.title: Workout buddy.

info.description:
Lenny, a 17 year old boy has never been on a date and never had a girlfriend in his life. He had friends who were girls, of course, but never a full-fledge relationship. His parents worry that his lack of social skills may be causing him to not be able to find love. That, or maybe he was out of shape. He's a very skinny boy, who doesn't work out, but doesn't eat junk food. He was also very smart, so he graduated high school by eleventh grade.

While in high school, he was bullied by a girl who was very muscled, had rock hard abs, and toned legs. She'd always pick on him, call him names, gave him wedges, she even threatened to rip his balls off once. Then one day, when school ended and he started to walk home, the muscled girl knocked him out, and took him to an abandoned warehouse. There, she made him strip and throw his clothes in the near by lake. She then walked towards him, got on her knees, and stroked his dick. You would think she was starting some foreplay that would lead to sex, but she literally jerked his dick so hard that the skin on his penis started peeling back. It burned and ripped so hard with each stroke she gave. He ejaculated more time than a porn addict on the last day no fap day, to the point where his penis started bleeding with each time he came.

Lenny was so overwhelmed with seeing blood come out his penis of all places, that he passed out. He awoke later in the hospital to find the doctors had to preform extreme surgery on his penis, or he would've lost it. Hearing this, he found an ever-lasting fear/hate for muscle head bodybuilders. Weeks after the event, Lenny went back to school for his last week. The muscle girl bully had approached him, she had flowers, and a note in her hands. Lenny, being as scared as he was, told the girl that she was a monster and that he hated her mortal being, and to leave him alone. The muscled girl got wide eyed, her mouth hanging open. Lenny saw tears running down her face as she dropped the flowers and note and ran off. Lenny regained his confidence and picked the note the bully left on the floor. And it said:

Lenard Todd Norman.........I know you probably hate me for what I did to you, and I can understand if your mad. The truth is.........I've always loved you, Lenard. It was never my intention to do any harm to you. If you can find it in your heart to forgive me, I'll be so happy. But if you can never forgive me, I can understand. Who could love someone that almost took their life? I'm so sorry. But I'll still love you.
- Katherine, Your muscle head bully

Lenny was so surprised at this letter, that he didn't even know what to feel anymore. Why did his life suddenly turn into the "Hey, Arnold" show? He didn't understand. During his last week of school, he never saw or heard of the muscle girl bully anymore. It's like she never existed............Now Lenny has to go to an Island filled with hundreds, literally thousands of Female bodybuilders that want to rip his guts out.

Will Lenny survive?

Let's lay down the rules here:
1.ALL of the bodybuilders must remain female.
2.Lenny is the only boy allowed in the story. Period.
3.If your gonna do any type of bondage, keep it soft. (Example: A girl ties lenny up to a chair and forces him to eat her out. NON-Example: A girl whips the shit out of Lenny for just breathing. -_-)
5.Sex is allowed, orgies, lesbianism, threesomes, ect. (Check bondage if you want to add that)
6.Not every bodybuilder has to be the leanest, most tall and strongest. Be creative with your women!
7.Have Fuuuuuuuuuuuuuunnnnnnnnnnnn!
